channel.title: Agents on Cluttered Cabinet
channel.description: Recent content in Agents on Cluttered Cabinet

item.title: Agents
item.description: Get agent to run docker container, access it, then run a random forest model on some data. Listened to a podcast once that said the biggest issue with a lot of agentic work is the lack of tools which have good interfaces for LLMs. So I should create good tools. Note: This is for my mac. It may work on Linux. Definitely (likely – maybe) wont work on Windows. I don’t plan to do anything with this code.
